nodes.explanation: phrases with "off the" followed by descriptions or actions
phrases related to on-duty and off-duty work activities
words related to movement or action away or separated from a specific location or situation
idiomatic expressions and phrases known as "offhand" or "offhanded"
phrases related to being off the normal course or expectation
phrases related to physical or metaphorical distance or separation
phrases or sentences containing the word "the" followed by specific adjectives like "off", "+" and "elsewhere"
phrases related to starting or beginning something
phrases related to being off course or deviating from expectations
phrases containing the term "off the" followed by a specific word or phrase
phrases with the word "the" followed by another word with a hyphen in the middle
phrases related to locations or physical directions
